## Part 1

```{r}
registers <- list("w" = 0, "x" = 0, "y" = 0, "z" = 0)
functions <- 
  get_premade(c(
    "inp" = "set", 
    "add",
    "mul" = "multiply", 
    "div" = "divide", 
    "mod" = "modulo"
  ))
functions$eql <- \(x, y) {
  self[[x]] <- if (sef[[x]] == self[[y]]) 1 else 0
}
a <- create_assembly2(registers, functions)
a$run(dt[1])
```
